Posts.Content: Nov 17, 2009 06:19PM marabrens wrote: Hello to all.  I am currently on Taxol, did the Adriamycin and Cytoxan over the summer.  I have some cunfusion.  My doctor wanted to do surgery on my left breast. masectomy.  He believes it will help prolong life to remove primary tumor.  I have seen a surgeaon who does not agree but says it is ultimately my choice.  OC is suggesting the abraxine/avastin combo as the next treatment plan for the coming year after I finish the taxol In Dec 28.  This chemo is already agressive and from what I have read I am very confused.  I am also confused about my surgery he also suggests removing the ovaries during the masectomy.  Has any removed their breast with metastatic diagnosis.
Posts.Title: Anyone on Abraxane/Avastin jneumann anamary1
